messages: Habibti Eusra, your voice alone could start a new music genre.
You are 5 feet of pure cuteness and 100% chaos, and I adore both.
If chubby means extra adorable, then Habibti you're overflowing with blessings.

If adorableness had a league table, Messi would be second. You're first.

Habibti, some moments feel like theyâ€™re written, not accidental.

You look at peopleâ€”through your voiceâ€”as if you understand more than they say.
If life had a slow-motion scene, your voice would be in it.

Somewhere between all the noise, youâ€™re the gentle part.

Habibti, Messi may dribble like poetryâ€¦ but you speak like one.
Ronaldoâ€™s goals are beautiful, but your voice? Wallah, thatâ€™s art.
BarÃ§a plays with heart, Madrid plays with prideâ€¦ and I talk to you with both.
Messi creates chances, Ronaldo creates momentsâ€¦ and you create butterflies.
Your Messi-love is cute. But I wish you talked about me with that passion.

BarÃ§a fans fall in love fast. Madrid fans fall deep. Guess which one I am, Habibti?

Sometimes I think you love teasing me about Messi more than you love Messi.

If you hyped me the way you hype Messi, I'd be unstoppable.

Messi scores goals. You score without even knowing it.
